localize.text:
The lower the HP of an employee with the corresponding weapon, the greater the damage
All enemies in the same room receive BLACK damage every 5 seconds The effect of equipping all E.G.O parts of the Apocalypse Bird: The damage type of the special ability is extended to RWBP
Effect when equipped with all E.G.O Gifts of the Apocalypse Bird: E.G.O changes as HP decreases

Only equippable if the employee has Fortitude, Prudence, Temperance, and Justice above 110
Inflicts all four types of damage (R, W, B, and P) with a special attack pattern at regular intervals
If an employee wears this equipment, Apocalypse Bird will be unable to appear.
When equipped with Punishment Bird's E.G.O. Gift: Grants "Punishment" Attack When equipped with Big Bird's E.G.O. Gift: Grants "Lamps" Attack When equipped with Judgement Bird's E.G.O Gift: Grants "Judgement" Attack When equipped with the Apocalypse Bird's E.G.O gift: Enables "Apocalypse" attack
If an employee wears this equipment, Apocalypse Bird will be unable to appear.
